CustomField.description: ** Required ** Select "Disabled" to turn off auto-renew for all related Subscriptions, select "Enabled" to allow related Subscriptions to optionally enable auto-renew, select "Required" to enable auto-renew without option.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Required ** Select "Disabled" to turn off auto-renew for all related Subscriptions, select "Enabled" to allow related Subscriptions to optionally enable auto-renew, select "Required" to enable auto-renew without option.
CustomField.label: Auto Renew Option
